pages.text: Well not every build is supposed to beat every map. You should always save all kinds of good gear so you are able to take on any Map. Some Maps decrease your Fire damage, some Decrease Sword Damage, some decrease both! Build around them. If mobs deal extra Fire damage, get Fire resist. If player has mana regen debuff, use an energy regen build etc.

If you still can't beat it, well save it! You can always beat it later, or throw it if it's too low level then. Don't rush into super high tier and rarity maps, it's an End-Game test of limits of gearing. They aren't supposed to be easily beaten.
